data.title: bd-30d: Fix sync cursor to handle empty lines in events.jsonl
data.description: Use total_lines() for cursor advancement instead of events.len(). This eliminates cursor drift when empty lines are present in v1 events.jsonl files.

data.reason: Clean fix. total_lines() correctly accounts for empty lines in cursor advancement, eliminating drift. No injection, path traversal, or access control changes. The TOCTOU between read_from() and total_lines() is theoretical and self-healing (hash mismatch on next sync triggers rebuild). Tests properly updated to assert no-drift behavior.
